revised_title: A Natural History and Anatomy of Whales, with a Focus on the Sperma Ceti Whale
tldr: This article provides a detailed description of various types of whales, their anatomy, behavior, and the process of ambergris formation within the Sperma Ceti whale. It also discusses the methods of oil extraction from these creatures and their importance to the economy of New England. The author, Paul Dudley, shares his observations and insights into the lives of these fascinating marine mammals.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Marine Biology
